Gluten Free in Binghamton Living Gluten Free in the Southern Tier Home About RSS ← A Recipe that Worked: Chicken and Pineapple Stir-Fry Sam’s Club → Best Gluten-Free Restaurants 17 Mar Although I’ve already done a post on gluten-free restaurants (check it out over here!) , I read something yesterday that I wanted to share with you. Triumph Dining took a poll to determine the BEST gluten-free restaurants. You can read their blog over here to see the results or read the information that I copied below:
(While I haven’t tried the brownie at Outback yet, I have heard that it’s FABULOUS!! Also, I so wish that there was a P.F. Chang’s closeby. I am determined to get there when I travel some this summer!)
Thank you again to the 5,800+ people who voted. Your votes counted, and here they are.
Best Gluten-Free Restaurants
Best Fast Food Restaurant Wendy’s
Best Gluten-Free Menu P.F. Chang’s
Best Gluten-Free Pizza Uno Chicago Grill
Best Gluten-Free Dishes
Best Gluten-Free Appetizer P.F. Chang’s Chicken Lettuce Wraps
Best Gluten-Free Main Course P.F. Chang’s GF Spicy Chicken
Best Gluten-Free Dessert Outback Chocolate Thunder From Down Under

March 17, 2011 at 9:13 am
I was just out at OSU for an accepted students restaurant, and my brother and I went to P.F. Changs to celebrate for my birthday! I had the lettuce wraps and then a chocolate dome“cake”for dessert. The meal was heavenly! What an awesome birthday treat…you never would have known it was all gluten free Reply
